message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple approach.
You rejected 50/50, I'll try to get a better deal
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'll give you a slightly better deal this time. Let's see if you'll accept.
You're getting desperate, I'll take a bigger share this time
You're trying to squeeze me dry, but I'll give you a slightly better deal again. Don't expect me to go easy on you, though.
You're running out of options, I'll take a bigger share now
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a slightly better deal again. Don't think you're getting away with this easily, though.
You're getting desperate, I'll take the majority of the money now
You're trying to take everything, but I'll give you a slightly better deal again. Don't think you're getting away with this easily, though.
You're almost out of options, I'll take nearly all the money now
You're trying to squeeze the last bit of money out of me, but I'll give you a slightly better deal again. Don't think you're getting away with this easily, though.
You're out of options, take the last crumbs
